title: Iron Man Arm
detail: I am Iron Man... well at least just the arm...
extended_details: We are planning to build an exoskeleton arm which will be actuated by emg sensors on the wearer's arm. The arm will be an exoskeleton that will be worn over the wearer's arm. It will be  moved by high powered servos on the joints of the arm. It will act as a protective exoskeleton to the user.
